Class EC2InstanceTemplate

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.Configured, com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.ResourceTemplate

    public class EC2InstanceTemplate
extends com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.compute.ComputeInstanceTemplate
    Represents a template for constructing EC2 compute instances.

      • EC2InstanceTemplate

        public EC2InstanceTemplate(String name,
                           com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.Configured configuration,
                           Map<String,String> tags,
                           com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model.LocalizationContext providerLocalizationContext)
        Creates an EC2 instance template with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the template
        configuration - the source of configuration
        tags - the map of tags to be applied to resources created from the template
        providerLocalizationContext - the parent provider localization context
